court: Jammu and Kashmir and Ladakh High Court

news.title: Border Area Development and Security Guidelines
news.content: The Jammu and Kashmir and Ladakh High Court has issued guidelines for balanced development in border areas while ensuring security considerations and local community welfare.
news.courtName: Jammu and Kashmir and Ladakh High Court

news.title: Ladakh High Altitude Environmental Conservation
news.content: The court mandates special environmental conservation measures for Ladakh's high-altitude ecosystem, protecting fragile biodiversity and promoting sustainable development practices.
news.courtName: Jammu and Kashmir and Ladakh High Court

news.title: Tourism Industry Recovery and Regulation
news.content: J&K and Ladakh High Court provides framework for tourism industry recovery post-pandemic, emphasizing safety protocols and sustainable tourism practices in the region.
news.courtName: Jammu and Kashmir and Ladakh High Court
